src:
China Open 2019: Fajar / Rian Susul Dua Seniornya ke Babak Kedua
06 Nov 2019, 16:47 by Antara, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Wakil ganda putra Indonesia Fajar Alfian/Muhammad Rian Ardianto melangkah ke babak dua turnamen bulu tangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 yang digelar di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Fuzhou, China.
Dalam pertandingan babak pertama yang berlangsung pada Rabu (6/11), Fajar/Rian menaklukkan pasangan asal Chinese Taipei Liao Min Chun/Su Ching Heng dalam dua gim berdurasi 26 menit dengan skor straight game 21-12, 21-12.
Gim pertama berjalan mulus bagi Fajar/Rian. Mereka terus memimpin sejak awal hingga akhir pertandingan. Lawannya pun tidak banyak berkutik menghadapi wakil Indonesia itu. Fajar/Rian unggul dengan perolehan 21-12.
Di gim kedua, Fajar/Rian masih terus memimpin. Tak ada perlawanan berarti dari pasangan Chinese Taipei tersebut. Sekali lagi, dengan skor akhir 21-12, Fajar/Rian kembali membuktikan keunggulannya.
Dengan demikian, Fajar/Rian yang menyandang status sebagai unggulan kelima itu dapat melanjutkan ke babak dua turnamen bulu tangkis level Super 750 yang berhadiah total sebesar 700.000 dolar Amerika Serikat itu.
Selanjutnya di babak dua Fuzhou China Open 2019 yang diselenggarakan pada Kamis (7/11) besok, Fajar/Rian akan berhadapan dengan pasangan asal Malaysia Aaron Chia/Soh Wooi Yik.
Selain Fajar/Rian, dua wakil ganda putra Indonesia lainnya yang juga lolos ke babak dua China Open 2019, yaitu Mohammad Ahsan/Hendra Setiawan dan Marcus Fernaldi Gideon/Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo.
text:
China Open 2019: Dawn / Rian Follow Two Senior Members to the Second Round
Nov 6 2019, 16:47 by Antara, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian men's doubles representative Fajar Alfian / Muhammad Rian Ardianto stepped into the second round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 badminton tournament held at the Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Fuzhou, China.
In the first round match which took place on Wednesday (6/11), Fajar / Rian defeated Chinese Taipei Liao Min Chun / Su Ching Heng in two 26-minute games with a straight game score of 21-12, 21-12.
The first game went smoothly for Fajar / Rian. They continued to lead from the beginning to the end of the match. His opponents did not do much to face the Indonesian representative. Dawn / Rian excels with the acquisition of 21-12.
In the second game, Fajar / Rian still continues to lead. There was no significant resistance from the Chinese Taipei couple. Once again, with a final score of 21-12, Fajar / Rian again proved his superiority.
Thus, Fajar / Rian who holds the status as the fifth seed can continue to the second round of the Super 750 level badminton tournament which has a total prize of 700,000 US dollars.
Furthermore, in the second round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 held on Thursday (7/11) tomorrow, Fajar / Rian will face a Malaysian couple Aaron Chia / Soh Wooi Yik.
Besides Fajar / Rian, two other Indonesian men's doubles representatives also qualified for the second round of the China Open 2019, namely Mohammad Ahsan / Hendra Setiawan and Marcus Fernaldi Gideon / Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo.
